extend.!description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.mdc.condition.ConditionModel with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel.extend}.
extend.!type: fn(sClassName: String, oClassInfo?: Object, FNMetaImpl?: fn()) -> fn()

parameters.oClassInfo: type: object, description: Object literal with information about the class
parameters.FNMetaImpl: type: function, description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to the metadata implementation used by this class
parameters.sClassName: type: string, description: Name of the class being created

sap.ui.mdc.condition.ConditionModel.!description: JSON based Model for sap.ui.mdc.FilterField controls. The model stores the entered values as condition objects.

getMetadata.!description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.mdc.condition.ConditionModel.

createCondition.!description:
Deprecated! Since undefined use the sap.ui.mdc.condition.Condition.createCondition
creates a condition instance for the condition model
createCondition.!type: fn(sFieldPath: String, sOperator: String, aValues: [Object]) -> Object

parameters.sOperator: type: string, description: the operator for the condition
parameters.aValues: type: any[], description: the array of values for the condition
parameters.sFieldPath: type: string, description: the fieldPath name of the condition

getConditions.!description: Returns conditions for a specified FieldPath.

parameters.sFieldPath: type: string, description: fieldPath of the condition

addCondition.!description: Adds a condition for a specified FieldPath.
addCondition.!type: fn(sFieldPath: String, oCondition: Object, bForce: Boolean) -> sap.ui.mdc.condition.ConditionModel

parameters.bForce: type: boolean, description: if set the condition will be added even if it already exist
parameters.sFieldPath: type: string, description: fieldPath of the condition
parameters.oCondition: type: object, description: condition to be added

createItemCondition.!description:
Deprecated! Since undefined use the sap.ui.mdc.condition.Condition.createItemCondition
creates a condition instance for the Item condition
createItemCondition.!type: fn(sFieldPath: String, sKey: String, sDescription: String) -> Object

parameters.sDescription: type: string, description: the description of the operator
parameters.sKey: type: string, description: the operator for the condition
parameters.sFieldPath: type: string, description: the fieldPath name of the condition
type: string, description: fieldPath of the condition

extend.!description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.mdc.condition.ConditionModel with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel.extend}.
extend.!type: fn(sClassName: String, oClassInfo?: Object, FNMetaImpl?: fn()) -> fn()

parameters.oClassInfo: type: object, description: Object literal with information about the class
parameters.FNMetaImpl: type: function, description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to the metadata implementation used by this class
parameters.sClassName: type: string, description: Name of the class being created

removeCondition.!description: Removes a condition for a specified FieldPath.
removeCondition.!type: fn(sFieldPath: String, vCondition: Number | Object) -> Boolean

parameters.vCondition: type: int|object, description: condition or index of the condition
parameters.sFieldPath: type: string, description: fieldPath of the condition

setConditions.!description: Sets conditions. All already existing conditions will be removed

parameters.oConditions: type: object, description: object of conditions for corresponding fieldPaths

sap.ui.mdc.condition.ConditionModel.!helpDescription: JSON based Model for sap.ui.mdc.FilterField controls. The model stores the entered values as condition objects.

insertCondition.!description: Inserts a condition for a specified FieldPath.
insertCondition.!type: fn(sFieldPath: String, iIndex: Number, oCondition: Object, bForce: Boolean) -> sap.ui.mdc.condition.ConditionModel

parameters.bForce: type: boolean, description: if set the condition will be inserted even if it already exist
parameters.sFieldPath: type: string, description: fieldPath of the condition
parameters.iIndex: type: int, description: index where the condition should be inserted
parameters.oCondition: type: object, description: condition to be inserted

merge.!description: merge conditions from the source conditionModel into this instance
merge.!type: fn(sFieldPath: String, oSourceConditionModel: sap.ui.mdc.condition.ConditionModel, sSourceFieldPath: String)

parameters.sSourceFieldPath: type: string, description: specifies which conditions from the source should be merged.
parameters.sFieldPath: type: string, description: specifies which conditions should be removed and replaced by the conditions from the source ConditionModel

clone.!description: creates a clone of the ConditionModel which contains the conditions for the sFieldPath

parameters.sFieldPath: type: string, description: specifies which conditions should be copied into the clone. If not specified all conditions will be copied.

indexOf.!description: Determines the index of a condition for a specified FieldPath.

parameters.sFieldPath: type: string, description: fieldPath of the condition
parameters.oCondition: type: object, description: condition to be searched

removeAllConditions.!description: Removes all conditions for a specified FieldPath.

parameters.sFieldPath: type: string, description: fieldPath of the condition

sap.ui.mdc.condition.FilterOperatorUtil.!description: Utilities to handle operators of conditions

addOperator.!description: Adds an operator to the list of known operators

setOperatorsForType.!description: Adds an operator to the list of known operators

sap.ui.mdc.condition.FilterOperatorUtil.!helpDescription: Utilities to handle operators of conditions

getMatchingOperators.!description: Returns the possible operators for the given base type and (if given) value.

parameters.sValue: type: string, description: the value entered so far
parameters.aOperators: type: string[], description: list of all supported operators

getDefaultOperator.!description: Returns the default operator for the given base type

getOperatorsForType.!description: Returns all available default operators for the given type.

sap.ui.mdc.!description: The SAPUI5 library that contains the metadata-driven controls and other entities.
sap.ui.mdc.!helpDescription: The SAPUI5 library that contains the metadata-driven controls and other entities.
